languages.text: "Наш капеллан молился о добром здравии и скором возвращении вашей светлости, {name} фон Валанциус". {n}Повисает напряженная пауза, и эфир заполняет свистящее дыхание Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа.{/n} "Позвольте справиться о судьбе Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла... Быть может, вам посчастливилось встретиться? К сожалению, за все это время он так и не вышел на связь".

traits.locale_text: "Наш капеллан молился о добром здравии и скором возвращении вашей светлости, {name} фон Валанциус". {n}Повисает напряженная пауза, и эфир заполняет свистящее дыхание Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа.{/n} "Позвольте справиться о судьбе Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла... Быть может, вам посчастливилось встретиться? К сожалению, за все это время он так и не вышел на связь".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."
languages.original_text: "Наш капеллан молился о добром здравии и скором возвращении вашей светлости, {name} фон Валанциус". {n}Повисает напряженная пауза, и эфир заполняет свистящее дыхание Эрбрегхта ап Даэффа.{/n} "Позвольте справиться о судьбе Лорд-капитана Винтерскейла... Быть может, вам посчастливилось встретиться? К сожалению, за все это время он так и не вышел на связь".

traits.locale_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to inquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he still did contact his subjects."
traits.speaker: Player

Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Notre chapelain a prié pour que Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius nous revienne {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve} dans les plus brefs délais. {n}Après une pause tendue, Erbreght ap Daeff reprend la parole, la gorge nouée.{/n} Me permettrez-vous de m'enquérir du sort du seigneur-capitaine Winterscale ? Avez-vous eu la chance de le rencontrer ? Malheureusement, il n'a toujours pas rétabli le contact avec ses sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Notre chapelain a prié pour que Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius nous revienne {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve} dans les plus brefs délais.Après une pause tendue, Erbreght ap Daeff reprend la parole, la gorge nouée.{/n} « Me permettrez-vous de m'enquérir du sort du seigneur-capitaine Winterscale ? Avez-vous eu la chance de le rencontrer ? Malheureusement, il n'a toujours pas rétabli le contact avec ses sujets. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我们的牧师在为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人祈祷，希望您身体健康，早日归来。”{n}音阵装置传来了紧张的停顿，以及埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫发出的嘶嘶声。{/n}“请允许我打听一下温特斯凯尔舰长大人……或许你们已经有幸见过面了？遗憾的是，过了这么久，他依然没有联系过他的臣民。”
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: “我们的牧师在为{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人祈祷，希望您身体健康，早日归来。”{n}音阵装置传来了紧张的停顿，以及埃尔布雷特·爱普·戴夫发出的嘶嘶声。{/n}“请允许我打听一下温特斯凯尔舰长大人……或许你们已经有幸见过面了？遗憾的是，过了这么久，他依然没有联系过他的臣民。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Unser Priester hat für die Gesundheit und schnelle Wiederkehr Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius gebetet." {n}Es entsteht eine angespannte Pause, in der Erbreght ap Daeffs zischender Atem die Luft erfüllt.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich nach dem Schicksal von Lord Captain Winterzunder zu erkundigen ... Vielleicht hattet Ihr das Glück, ihm zu begegnen? Unglücklicherweise hat er seine Untertanen noch immer nicht kontaktiert."
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Priester hat für die Gesundheit und schnelle Wiederkehr Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius gebetet." {n}Es entsteht eine angespannte Pause, in der Erbreght ap Daeffs zischender Atem die Luft erfüllt.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich nach dem Schicksal von Lord Captain Winterzunder zu erkundigen ... Vielleicht hattet Ihr das Glück, ihm zu begegnen? Unglücklicherweise hat er seine Untertanen noch immer nicht kontaktiert."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Nuestro capellán estaba rezando por la buena salud y el rápido regreso de su señoría, {name} von Valancius». {n}Se produce una pausa tensa y el aliento sibilante de Erbreght ap Daeff Erbreght inunda el ambiente.{/n} «Querría obtener información sobre el destino del Lord Capitán Winterscale... ¿Ha podido conocerlo? Por desgracia, no ha contactado con sus súbditos en todo este tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro capellán estaba rezando por la buena salud y el rápido regreso de su señoría, {name} von Valancius». {n}Se produce una pausa tensa y el aliento sibilante de Erbreght ap Daeff Erbreght inunda el ambiente.{/n} «Querría obtener información sobre el destino del Lord Capitán Winterscale... ¿Ha podido conocerlo? Por desgracia, no ha contactado con sus súbditos en todo este tiempo».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「私たちの教戒官は、陛下の健康と迅速な帰還を祈っていました、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様」{n}会話は一瞬緊張し、エルブレート・アプ・ダエフの息遣いが聞こえた。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテンのウィンタースケールの運命についてお聞かせください…もしかすると、幸運にも彼にお会いになられましたか？残念ながら、現在まで彼は部下と連絡を取っておりません」
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの教戒官は、陛下の健康と迅速な帰還を祈っていました、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様」{n}会話は一瞬緊張し、エルブレート・アプ・ダエフの息遣いが聞こえた。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテンのウィンタースケールの運命についてお聞かせください…もしかすると、幸運にも彼にお会いになられましたか？残念ながら、現在まで彼は部下と連絡を取っておりません」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Papazımız, zatialiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri'nin sağlığı ve ivedilikle dönmesi için dua ediyordu." {n}Gerginlikle geçen bir müddetin ardından Erbreght ap Daeff'in tıslayan nefesi duyuluyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle Lord Kaptan Winterscale'in akıbetini soracağım... Görüşme şansına nail oldunuz mu? Bunca vakit geçti ama tebaasına hâlâ ulaşmadı."
languages.original_text: "Our chaplain was praying for the good health and speedy return of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {name} von Valancius." {n}There is a tense pause and Erbreght ap Daeff's hissing breath fills the air.{/n} "Allow me to enquire about the fate of Lord Captain Winterscale... Perhaps you were lucky enough to meet? Unfortunately, in all this time he has still not contacted his subjects."
